Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that in #Goron City# the hammer unlocks #a Deku Stick#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that the #Spirit Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that #Gerudo Valley# is on the way of the hero.
